 012:     """ Extracts features from a sequential datum.
 013: 
 014:     A sequence of N-dimensional points is represented as a 2D array with
 015:     shape (nb_points, nb_dimensions).
 016: 
 017:     Parameters
 018:     ----------
 019:     is_order_invariant : bool (optional)
 020:         tells if this feature is invariant to the sequence's ordering. This
 021:         means starting from either extremities produces the same features.
 022:         (Default: True)
 023: 
 024:     Notes
 025:     -----
 026:     When subclassing `Feature`, one only needs to override the `extract` and
 027:     `infer_shape` methods.
